Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Upgraded HVAC: New furnace, newer air conditioning system and newer roof in place
Parking for 26 vehicles in a shared, fenced lot
Additional on-site warehouse storage available
Lease rate: $9.00/SF plus utilities

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Easy access to public transportation with multiple bus routes and light rail access at the NFTA Metro Rail’s Utica Station.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
A completely renovated 3,270 SF single tenant office building available for lease on Main Street near Utica Street.

The current layout consists of eight (8) offices, a large reception area, small kitchen area, a large conference room, separate men’s and women’s restrooms. The site also features outdoor space behind the building.

Ideal for medical-related service businesses, research firms, marketing companies, community services, or day care providers.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 3,200 SF single tenant office building in downtown Buffalo, NY

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Approximately 5,000 SF on two floors in the neighboring building

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Fully built out with 12 private offices, a conference room, training room and abundant open workspace.
Warehouse storage space could also be made available.
Located near multiple bus stops and approximately 500 ft. to NFTA Metro Rail Summer-Best Station

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text:
Located across the street from a new mixed-use, luxury apartment complex slated to open September 2020.

Two blocks north of Buffalo Niagara Medical Campus and 500 feet from the NFTA Metro Rail Summer-Best Station.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Approximately 9,000 SF of office space comprising the entire fourth floor of a 74,000 SF office building. 

The suite is fully built out with 12 private offices, a conference room, training room and abundant open workspace.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: The second floor space has a current layout for medical office use with seven exam rooms, a reception area, two labs, and a nurses station.
The third floor space has a current layout of private offices and conference rooms.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Off-street parking with 48 parking spots on-site
Across the street from NFTA Metro Summer-Best Station and The Grid Apartments

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Up to 8,000 SF of office space available for lease just two blocks from Buffalo Niagara Medical Campus at the corner of Main Street and Summer Street.

Recently acquired by Gold Wynn, this building just north of the University at Buffalo Jacobs School of Medicine is in the midst of interior and exterior renovations.

The second floor space has a current layout for medical office use with seven exam rooms, a reception area, two labs, and a nurses station.

The third floor space has a current layout of private offices and conference rooms.

On-site reserved parking included at rate of 1 space per 1,000 SF leased, $100/month per each additional space.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 8,000 SF near Buffalo Niagara Medical Campus

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Class A office sublease opportunities in the IBM Buffalo Innovation Center
The space consists of two fully-furnished floors with the ability to accommodate up to 250 seats
Some qualifying factors apply such as the creation of new tech jobs in the Buffalo Niagara region

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Easily accessible by public transit located at the Fountain Plaza Station (NFTA Metro Rail) in the heart of downtown Buffalo and within walking distance of many amenities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Class A office spaces located in the IBM Innovation Center at 40 Fountain Plaza in the heart of downtown Buffalo. The space consists of two fully-furnished floors with the ability to accommodate up to 250 seats. Collaborative spaces include open tables, breakout areas, and conference rooms

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: NFTA Metro Rail access via Seneca Station - 275 ft. (northbound) and 500 ft. (southbound)
Co-tenants include: Mon Ami Cafe & Restaurant and Anthology (formerly Campus Labs)

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Situated near the southern end of Main Street, Cathedral Place is a short walk to governmental offices and courts, food amenities, and Canalside while offering nearby access to I-190 and Route 5.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Ground floor fitness studio and second floor office spaces available for lease in Cathedral Place, a 103,000 SF mixed-use property in the heart of downtown Buffalo.

Recently acquired by Gold Wynn, this building underwent a $10.5 million renovation that included marble finishes in the lobby, new mechanical systems, and the creation of 26 high-end live/work lofts on the top five floors.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Office/retail space in the atrium of Olympic Towers.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Suites ranging from 700 - 12,927 SF
On-site restaurant "The Lunch Box"
Proximity to courts and government offices
Nearby access to I-190 and Rt. 33

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Olympic Towers is located adjacent to the Buffalo Niagara Convention Center with its main entrance on Pearl Street and an additional entrance on Franklin Street.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Olympic Towers is located in downtown Buffalo and comprised of two towers that make up the office complex. The complex is listed on the National Register of Historic Places and was built by architects Green & Wicks in 1901 as a new facility for the YMCA’s second oldest chapter in the United States. The complex today consists of the 10-story historic tower, a 4-story atrium, and a 4-story office tower addition added in the 1980s.

The property is within walking distance of courts, government offices, and many nearby amenities. The atrium features a cafe serving breakfast and lunch, while offering catering services to tenants.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Walking distance to government offices and local, state, and federal courts
Ground floor restaurant and banquet space (former Shayleen’s Restaurant)
One block from access to I-190 via Exit 7 (Church Street) and Route 5/Skyway
Building amenities include Jonny the Barber and Esporta Fitness

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 69 Delaware is situated across from Buffalo City Court and is within walking distance of government offices as well as local, state, and federal courthouses. Numerous food options are just a few blocks away.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Multiple office suites available for lease in The Athletic Club Building, a 124,000 SF office building at the edge of Niagara Square.

Recent updates and renovations include upgraded elevator cars and a full lobby remodel featuring art deco murals. On-site amenities include a barbershop and an Esporta Fitness location. The property features on-site management and 24/7/365 security and maintenance.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: One block from access to I-190 via Exit 7 (Church Street) and Route 5/Skyway
Walking distance to government offices and local, state, and federal courts

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: 42 Delaware is situated between the Erie County Holding Center and Buffalo City Court and is within walking distance of Erie County Family Court, and the Erie County Courthouse. Numerous food options are just a few blocks away.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Multiple office suites available for lease in a prestigious 63,000 SF executive office building that is anchored by law firm Lipsitz Green Scime Cambria LLP.

Recently acquired by Gold Wynn, the property has undergone major renovations and tenant remodeling in 2020. The property features on-site management and 24/7/365 security and maintenance.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Convenient North Buffalo location 0.5 mile from Route 198 and Buffalo State College with many nearby food and retail amenities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
200 to 525 square foot office suites available for lease at the signalized corner of Amherst Street and Bridgeman Street.

Suite 1 is an approximately 200 square foot private office that is fully furnished office.

Suite 2 is an approximately 500 square foot open office space at the rear of the building featuring a private secure entrance.

Both suites include off-street parking along with a shared kitchen, restroom and conference room.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 200 - 525 SF office suites in North Buffalo
